Intonation is the psychological perception of the change in pitch during a spoken utterance .It can also be called the tune of an utterance .Intonation is the perception of the physical signal , fundamental frequency ( F0 ) .F0 is a measurable signal produced of voiced speech , a glottal vibration such as evident in the phone /v/ as opposed to the unvoiced phone /f/. The excitation for voiced speech sounds is produced through periodic vibration at the glottis , which in turn produces a pulse train spaced at regular intervals .

Lexical prominence is often called syllabic stress , or just stress .
